WaveHero.Hero_PikminGuruGuru: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="2c5c8c51865f4ec8823e64fecabc5835" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Huh? The Pikmin must be blocked...

WaveHero.Hero_LuckyGuruGuru_Down_Carry: [Npc:Icon chara="NoChara"/][UE:Meta key="3c92f4505a2f4c8c96b40568ec1162b4" Scale="1"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] cannot carry this object any further.

WaveHero.Hero_OlimarDown:
[Npc:Icon chara="NoChara"/][UE:Meta key="09ad0c28b89543edbb9a9b64e875638b" Scale="1"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Olimar"/]Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] was knocked out.

WaveHero.Hero_UseRecoveryKit_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="cd0bc8fed8214d3bb84048194759b732" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Huzzah! I'm feeling fit as a fiddle.
WaveHero.Hero_UseRecoveryKit_02: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="ad3d8d6ee98543368162f6eb0b2db4ad" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]That was close... Too close.

WaveHero.Pikmin_MassDeath_Hero_00:

WaveHero.Pikmin_MassDeath_Hero_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="4763c7c327504c41a18c94c51fcc0204" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SurpriseFaceNormal"/]So many casualties...
WaveHero.Pikmin_MassDeath_Hero_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="ac2b4c0b3829406c86844e18893e34ea" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]To lose that many Pikmin...

WaveHero.Item_Drone_PinDelete_Hero_P00_Down:

Remove pins that are no longer needed.
WaveHero.Hero_PartsDiscovery_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="96f419a656a44388942bcb336f766e67" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SurpriseFaceNormal"/]There's a part here too!
WaveHero.Hero_PartsDiscovery_02: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="aada5b3b0cc34098ba5e3330792f4d6e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Thank goodness! Another ship part!
WaveHero.Hero_PartsDiscovery_03: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="357eb837de994fc98777fb8e8f37e50e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Over there! A ship part!
WaveHero.Hero_PartsDiscovery_04: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="546629f038a942fa89b7f528f1bbeeb6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Another ship part! This gives me hope.
WaveHero.Hero_PartsDiscovery_05: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="01c5147ea6e34ce38178a4f1da7f5378" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]This part's not too worse for wear...
WaveHero.Hero_PartsDiscovery_01_Down: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="05daab33de754fefb4995d844bc500cc" Scale="1"/]You discovered a ship part.
WaveHero.Hero_PartsCollect_Fixed_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="741ed310e4864ff980076205e90b1c7d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]That's [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]5 down[System:Color name="Default"]...
WaveHero.Hero_PartsCollect_Fixed_02: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="ab754677d8b14d20a32541875a302213" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]I'm far from done, but I won't give up!
WaveHero.Hero_PartsCollect_Fixed_03: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="7e8f3ecda01c496fa1969410ead63522" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Only [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]10 more[System:Color name="Default"] to go! Just one last push!
WaveHero.Hero_PartsCollect_Fixed_04: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="0cfdc1432e7b47abb2df581f421cda27" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]Yes! Now I can send the distress signal!
WaveHero.Hero_OnyonDiscovery_Yellow:

WaveHero.Hero_OnyonDiscovery_Yellow_Down: [Npc:Icon chara="NoChara"/][UE:Meta key="ce4108f7bd064499b7dddf0304c832e2" Scale="1"/]You discovered a [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Yellow Onion[System:Color name="Default"].

WaveHero.Hero_OnyonDiscovery_Blue_Down: [Npc:Icon chara="NoChara"/][UE:Meta key="5991c720ab514ad4bd26a3e02672c87c" Scale="1"/]You discovered a [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Blue Onion[System:Color name="Default"].
WaveHero.Hero_OnyonDiscovery_Boost:

[Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Could it be a type of Onion?
WaveHero.Hero_OnyonDiscovery_Boost_Uncollected:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="b4cf9ea4a696479db38749019285bd3f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Oh! Here's another one.
[Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I should bring it back and examine it.
WaveHero.Hero_OnyonDiscovery_Boost_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="e087ce2fb4304ce18e771a95e6af38a9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Excellent! Another [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]flarlic[System:Color name="Default"]!
WaveHero.Hero_OnyonDiscovery_Boost_02: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="06674ffeacc34c86abc01517712256e5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Aha! With this I can withdraw more Pikmin!
WaveHero.Hero_OnyonDiscovery_Boost_Down: [Npc:Icon chara="NoChara"/][UE:Meta key="babc390a56614e758a51caf8a6685821" Scale="1"/]You discovered [System:Color name="Emphasis" ][Carrot:OnyonCarryBoostName/][System:Color name="Default"].
WaveHero.Hero_PikminDiscovery_Yellow:

WaveHero.Hero_PikminDiscovery_Blue_Down: [Npc:Icon chara="NoChara"/][UE:Meta key="3b42d5eca85e4090a97fd7a622ca4b99" Scale="1"/]You met a [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Blue Pikmin[System:Color name="Default"].
WaveHero.Hero_CampDiscovery: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="8fb69cb5926e469ca1122c2fe3b5bc67" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]This is a good spot to land the S.S. Dolphin.
WaveHero.Hero_BlockCamp: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="5bfc0af068b04cbab244b90281501b8b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]The S.S. Dolphin can't land here right now.

WaveHero.Hero_OlimarDamage: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="f8865bd35cbf405c8d066faabce58d6e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Uh-oh. This escalated quickly...
WaveHero.Hero_LuckyDamage: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="1c928d86e152486fb256eeae3a7c0074" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]What's wrong, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]? You OK?

WaveHero.Hero_NearDeath_Olimar: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="1f8ef3d486bb4342996f200ef29fc832" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Urgh... This might be it for me...
WaveHero.Hero_NearDeath_Lucky: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="9f59318249b34f4b9b0f83fc6e572797" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Obie"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is on the verge of collapse!
WaveHero.Hero_NearDeath_Lucky_Down: [Npc:Icon chara="NoChara"/][UE:Meta key="dfec168a639d41d4a4f492aefb576afe" Scale="1"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is running low on HP.
WaveHero.Hero_AbnormalStatus_Lucky: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="c700fce1274346a2824546cda87333a4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Huh?! I can blow on my whistle to fix this.
WaveHero.Hero_AbnormalStatus_Pikmin: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="23f9df16427043f69d4e160c583f7588" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Huh?! I can blow on my whistle to fix this.

WaveHero.Hero_Pikmin_Buried_3Minutes_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="ceba7caee9494594b6a226534f5712e8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SurpriseFaceNormal"/]Oops! I forgot all about my Pikmin sprouts!

WaveHero.Hero_Pikmin_Buried_3Minutes_00_Down: [Npc:Icon chara="NoChara"/][UE:Meta key="3284b06960c148c48ee141b657f9934f" Scale="1"/]Pikmin sprouts are waiting to be plucked.
WaveHero.Hero_Last3or2Day_AreaCaution:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="71f50c5fcd1d4614a01c601534b43d61" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Ack! I've already investigated this area.

WaveHero.Hero_PikminGuruGuru_Area010Event:

WaveHero.Hero_Happy_WorkEnd_Join_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="51d35d7740944de98b988e456c9b7999" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Good girl, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]! You made it back to me!
WaveHero.Hero_Happy_SmellSearch_OrderStart: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="9aff3a0f1bb34da89f90bfc8f463b2b9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]Go, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]! Follow that scent!
WaveHero.Hero_Happy_SmellSearch_NothingEnd: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="b5fcfad243c7472f9c3efa12e4516208" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]I guess there are no scents to track here.
WaveHero.Hero_Happy_SmellSearch_NothingEnd_Down: [Npc:Icon chara="NoChara"/][UE:Meta key="12e91577a0804f24976e62760868ca46" Scale="1"/]Nothing to smell here.
WaveHero.Hero_Happy_PikminlSearch_NothingEnd: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="c8c351b74ab14efdad5a145467ff5720" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GoodJob"/]Excellent! No stray Pikmin out there!
WaveHero.Hero_Seijin_PikminlSearch_NothingEnd: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="5791cecabb7343dd8fc47454d135ce10" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Good. There are no stray Pikmin, then!
WaveHero.Hero_Happy_SmellSearch_End: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="c47f3ecb0d714a2e9ae55a78ac7cd766" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]So that's where the scent is coming from!

WaveHero.Hero_Happy_SmellSearch_TroubleEnd: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="b6da2e4a9ed9459fbdc59191623e3f83" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SurpriseFaceNormal"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]! Are you OK?!

[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="e2fab969849743bca26ea089aae69f06" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Not good. We're out of raw materials.
[Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]We [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]can't build [System:Color name="Default"]until we get some more.
WaveHero.Hero_Sizai_Wait_00_Down: [Npc:Icon chara="NoChara"/][UE:Meta key="64eb44c7dfc349248d0b54ba5a3ce943" Scale="1"/]You're out of raw materials.
WaveHero.Hero_Item_Announce_Gekikara_00:
